articles.title: How To Communicate In A Busy World
articles.excerpt: We live in a world full of distraction. Our attention is not tolerating more influences that dissolve our focus. In this How-To guide, we provide you with 10 tactics if you want to capture attention in a busy world, and communicate your message to your audience effectively.

articles.title: Think Outside The Box: Idea Framing And Limited Thinking
articles.excerpt: Creative, unconventional ideas require shift in perspective. Framing and judging ideas in early stages of thinking kills creativity. Step out of the boundaries drawn by your mind, and deploy a state of creative flow.

articles.title: What Is The Future Of FinTech
articles.excerpt: Did you know that Blockchain Technology has the potential to transform the traditional way we invest in physical assets?

articles.title: Why You Need To Change Your Morning Routine
articles.excerpt: You are successful in your job — the alpha manager or the best deal-closer of the year, but you might struggle to ensure success achieving your own goals. The first hours of the day are where history makers created. How do you keep your productivity at its peak and ensure legendary success?

articles.title: An Unforgettable Snow Polo World Cup In St. Moritz
articles.excerpt: Snow Polo World Cup in St. Moritz is an unforgettable sports event that combines the thrill of snow polo with the beauty of the Alpine winter landscape.

articles.title: How To Own The Rugged Gentleman Style
articles.excerpt: Between all types of masculinity, a Refined Gentleman who is financially and influentially masculine is more common, with their connections, money and social/political power. On contrary, Rugged Man is least common, and considered aggressive, with brute force and non-tolerating attitude towards nonsense. Modern men in 2023 need to own the Rugged Gentleman style and mix qualities of both masculine types.

articles.title: The Gentleman's Guide To Be More Attractive
articles.excerpt: A rugged gentleman needs to learn how to be more attractive; either to pamper his own woman, or to win himself the god-damn-hottest-girl-in-the-bar date and always look his best.

articles.title: Turning 30: About The Journey Without The Fear
articles.excerpt: Turning thirty is a life-changing milestone. The story of my own experience — full of passion as well as fear, may it inspire you find your freedom and purpose in life.

articles.title: Must-Watch On Netflix In 2023
articles.excerpt: From new releases to old classics, the streaming giant, Netflix, has a batch of worthy entertainment. The HiM Journal hand-picked this list with great care that you are entertained in 2023.

articles.title: Holdall Bags, For The Modern Explorers
articles.excerpt: Rugged Gentlemen would always opt for the road less travelled. The holdall bag is the ideal companion that can accommodate a week-worth of clothing for explorers, adventurers and commuters.

articles.title: 4 Scientifically-Proven Health Benefits Of Dark Chocolate
articles.excerpt: HiM Journal health experts are about to give you four more reasons to love chocolate — improve your health and increase your sexual drive, while enjoying this delicious superfood.

articles.title: HIIT Workouts That Will Promote Your Muscle Strength
articles.excerpt: Rugged Gentlemen would always need to keep fit and dynamic, as they are facing different challenges that harsh environments through over. However, as a successful gentleman running your own business, or leading a top brand, it is rare that you have enough time for a two hour-worth of gym, that is where HITT can keep the drive on, while saving you time to rock on your business.

articles.title: The Honest Reasons You Should Never Have Kids
articles.excerpt: Having a bab is a beautiful thing, but it can be the most overwhelming and worst experience to live. Experts at HiM Journal explain why some men should never have kids.

articles.title: A Gentleman's Guide On How To Navigate Hookups
articles.excerpt: Hookups are a common culture in modern dating, but navigating them can be a dangerous path to walk. The HiM Journal gentlemen will guide you how to be the bad boy who gets what he wants.

articles.title: My Rear Derailleur Got Broken, Here is What I Did
articles.excerpt: A broken read derailleur doesn't need to mean an end to your cycling trip. Learn from Scouts and Be Ready for emergencies with these mechanical skills at the most inconvenient moments.

articles.title: Beard Balm or Beard Oil: What Works Best For You?
articles.excerpt: There is a hot debate raging whether a rugged gentleman should use beard oil or beard balm. Both share common characteristics, however serve different causes. Try these products to tailor your beard for winter.

articles.title: 7 Places You Can't Miss While In Rome
articles.excerpt: Rome is the city that can steal your heart and keep it locked. I am sorry to say, if you go to Rome once, you will never get back happy. You will always miss this one tiny piece of your soul that was kept there, and you will want to go back repeatedly. A mix of the modern world built on the ruins of ancient greatness.

articles.title: 8 Life Experiences You Should Try In 2023
articles.excerpt: There’s more into Life than work. We are meant to be happy in life, since we live only once, as the saying goes. We need to have more experiences, after all, we will have more stories to tell.

articles.title: Self-Guided Tour To Paris, And How It Turned, Spectacular
articles.excerpt: City of Light, Love and Croissant. The city of Architecture and Le Musée du Louvre. The home of Disney Princesses and French Parfums. Never fails to fill you with magic and affection. In this guide you will find the experiences you must have to uncover this magic.

articles.title: Vintage Bentleys On The Frozen Lake Of St. Moritz
articles.excerpt: For die-hard car enthusiasts, gather with great people and make sure you have fun in the most unusual and unique lifestyle automotive event, on the frozen lake of St. Moritz.
